text: Dean Foods was an American food and beverage company. It was the largest dairy company in the United States. The company's products included milk, ice cream, dairy products, cheese, juice, and teas. It processed milk in the United States under a number of regional and national brands. It was founded in 1925. It filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in 2019, and its assets were acquired by several buyers in 2020. Category:American food companies Category:1925 establishments in the United States
title: Dean Foods
